name: Meri's Cafe
description:
Relax, settle in! Grab a drink and a friend to share it with... and welcome to Meri's Cafe!
 Meri's Cafe is a visual novel/coffee shop simulator where you complete orders of coffee, tea, and slushies for a variety of customers! You play as Meriwether, a new face in the big city who's going to need to learn to rely on the friends he makes at his new job or else risk the storm of internal pressure lurking his way. ...Literally. He's a Nimnine, a species known for retaining water, electricity, and their emotions and releasing them all at once like a hurricane. Can you help him last a week at his new gig by serving orders, making friends, and following up with favors? Featuring:
  • 9 unique customers to serve, including some cameos from the game HYADES!
  • Over 25 unique recipes of coffee, tea, and slushies to make!
  • An extensive dual soundtrack with an A-side and B-side!
Want to get to know Marsh, Anise, Charles, Ruth, or Graham a little better? Check out the game where they're from, HYADES! Want to support us? Leave a like, comment, or review of the game here! Sharing the game to your friends helps a ton too, and fan art is always appreciated!! We hope you enjoy your stay at Meri's cafe! Have fun! CONTACT
